Package mystars.entities

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • mystars.entities.Entity
      • mystars.entities.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Student
    public class User
extends Entity
    This user class serves as the superclass for 'admin' and 'student'. It manages the verification of a user's password when logging in.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      User​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Create a new user after ensuring that there is no other user with the same username.

     throws AppException

        password - The user's password.

      • login

        public static User login​(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws AppException
        Validates a user's login by verifying that their username and password matches the entry in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - The user's username.
        password - The user's password.
        Returns:
        The user object of the user successfully logging in.
        Throws:
        AppException - If the login is unsuccessful due to incorrect username or password.

      • login

        public boolean login​(java.lang.String password)
              throws AppException
        Compare the hash of the user's entered password with the password hash stored for that user in the database.
        Parameters:
        password - The user's password.
        Returns:
        true if the user has logged in successfully, oor false otherwise
        Throws:
        AppException - If the login failed

        public boolean isAdmin()
